name: Dinari USD+
description: Dinari's USD+ is a yield bearing stablecoin that is 100%-backed by short-term US treasuries and USD. This allow users to hold tokens that are simultaneously a stable store of value and also provide stable yield. USD+ is pegged to the US dollar with guaranteed 1:1 redemptions. You can mint USD+ by depositing existing stablecoins (USDT and USDC), and redeem theme at any time. USD+ holders automatically accrue yield through rebasing, without the need of manual staking.
